scripts.build:js: browserify src/js/index.js -g uglifyify --standalone Main -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/js/index.js --standalone Main -o dist/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types ] ] -t espowerify -v
scripts.start: npm run serve & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css
